title: HTML & CSS: The Complete Guide
description: Build the foundations needed to become a web developer. In this course we will go through HTML and CSS from start to finish.

videos.title: Getting Started
videos.description: In this video we learn what HTML and CSS is and we discuss what you will learn during this tutorial.

videos.title: HTML Structure
videos.description: Learn how to set up your HTML files.

videos.title: Head
videos.description: Learn about the <head> tag, what it's used for, and what goes there.

videos.title: Body
videos.description: In this video we go through the <body> tag and what it is used for.

videos.title: Introducing CSS
videos.description: Learn the basics of styling your HTML pages.

videos.title: Classes & IDs
videos.description: Give your HTML elements identifiers by using classes & IDs. These elements can then be identified easily by CSS and JavaScript.

videos.title: Div Containers
videos.description: This video elabourates on <div> tags and how useful they are when creating your HTML pages.

videos.title: Padding & Margin
videos.description: Back to CSS, this video outlines the differences between padding and margin, and how to use them.

videos.title: CSS Display Property
videos.description: Learn about the different display property values in CSS.

videos.title: Positioning Elements
videos.description: Learn about the different positioning property values in CSS, the difference between them and when to use them.

videos.title: HTML Forms
videos.description: Create a basic form in HTML, utilising different input elements.

videos.title: Useful HTML Elements
videos.description: Other useful HTML elements we have not touched on so far during this course are discussed here.

videos.title: Other CSS Properties
videos.description: There are so many more properties to discuss when it comes to CSS. This video goes through a few more properties that we did not cover during this series.
